content: finished size if crocheted with sport yarn and 2 25 mm hook wednesday addams amigurumi should measure about 8 5 cm 3 35 inches tall skills needed magic_ring crocheting in spiral single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet increase and decrease stitches ability to sew multiple pieces together changing color embroidering the printable pdf is total of 5 pages this wednesday crochet pattern is available in english and indonesian
